CustomField.description: ** Conditionally Required ** Select "Invoice" to invoice the subscriber for each installment. Select "Automatic Payment" to automatically charge the subscriber using a stored Payment Method. Select "User Option" to allow the customer to choose.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Conditionally Required ** Select "Invoice" to invoice the subscriber for each installment. Select "Automatic Payment" to automatically charge the subscriber using a stored Payment Method. Select "User Option" to allow the customer to choose.
CustomField.label: Schedule Type
